snippet.title: One Hour and a Straight Line (OHSL) - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
1 hour nonstop parkour with musical guns, wall climbing and platform building. Good to relax. Can you make it under 1 hour though?

This singleplayer game is based on the mechanics of the previous multiplayer only (and failed) game Firing Vibes. With much feedback taken into consideration.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2712630/One_Hour_And_A_Straight_Line/
